There's a shock to seeing images of yourself that someone       could think are real.

…Act will require social media and other online  public platforms to provide a mechanism for people to notify the  platform of nonconsensual intimate images in which they are depicted.  It also requires the platforms to take reasonable steps to remove the  images from their platforms within 48 hours.
